Micro Game Arena

- Single HTML file with inline CSS and JS (no external dependencies).
- Dark futuristic theme: black background, neon green (#00FF41) accents, monospace font.
- Central game arena shows **4 micro games** selectable via buttons/tabs: Snake, Pong, Memory Cards, Number Guesser.
- **Snake**: 15x10 grid, arrow keys/WASD control, eat food (+10pts), collision ends game, high score persists.
- **Pong**: 2-paddle vertical game (player vs AI), mouse/Y-axis control left paddle, ball bounces, first to 5 wins.
- **Memory Cards**: 4x4 grid (8 pairs), click to flip/match, timer tracks solves, shuffle on start/new game.
- **Number Guesser**: Guess 1-100 number (5 attempts), hotter/colder hints, streak counter.
- **Drag-and-drop** game selection: drag game thumbnails to reorder arena tabs.
- **JSON export/import**: Save button exports all scores/games to downloadable JSON; Load button parses dropped JSON file.
- **localStorage** persistence for high scores, game states, custom order across sessions.
- **Keyboard support**: Tab/Esc for menus, Enter to start games, arrow keys universal navigation.
- **Responsive design**: Mobile-friendly (touch/swipe controls), scales to 320px min-width.
- **Print-friendly**: CSS @media print hides controls, shows score table only.
- **Testable features**: Console logs game events; shareable URL hash encodes current game/high score.
- Total impl <800 LOC: Canvas for games, flexbox layout, minimal DOM updates.
